item.title: These 5 stocks reporting earnings next week have momentum on their side
item.description: Stocks reporting results next week that could see a post-earnings boost include Progressive and Charles Schwab.

item.title: An AI stock showing a classic uptrend that investors should ride for as long as possible
item.description: David Keller breaks down the charts on Arista Networks.

item.title: Retail investors are back in the market in a big way after summer pause. What they are buying
item.description: Everyday traders upped their investment flows this week compared with the last two months.

item.title: Netflix is missing out on the market's latest run. Josh Brown thinks that could change soon
item.description: Josh and Sean give the set-up on Netflix ahead of earnings, which are often a volatile time for the stock.

item.title: DraftKings was hit hard on the prediction markets threat. One analyst believes the sell-off is overdone
item.description: Berenberg sees shares of DraftKings rallying 27% from their current valuation.
